title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1276.10 - Special equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1276.10 - Special equipment

State Regulations

Every tank vehicle in addition to regular headlights and
tail lights shall be fitted with a warning stop light actuated when the brakes
are applied, directional signal lights both front and rear, under driver
control to signal turning of the vehicle. Tank vehicles equipped with operating
decks or superstructures shall be fitted with clearance lights on each corner
of the deck or superstructure, amber in color, to indicate the height, width
and length of the vehicle, visible from all directions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1276.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
